overview: A rogue ex-Soviet General has stolen a nuclear warhead and is offering it for sale to the highest bidder. In order to break the warhead’s security codes, the General has kidnapped United Nations weapons expert Mia Gerard (Daniela Krhut). But he has not counted on the fact that Mia’s husband (Olivier Gruner) is a highly-trained killing machine who will stop at nothing to secure his wife’s release.
tagline: The rules of the game have just changed...
title: Deadly Engagement
